solutions.subtitle: OUR SOLUTIONS
solutions.disclaimer: *Depending on selected options and customization needs

sportsbook.title: SPORTSBOOK API INTEGRATION
sportsbook.desc: Quickly integrate and configure our Sportsbook API, designed for iGaming aggregators, platforms, and operators who need a new Sportsbook or wish to enhance an existing one.

whiteLabel.title: WHITE LABEL
whiteLabel.desc: Digicetra's White Label solution provides licensed operators with a complete suite of premium products, allowing you to expand your business effortlessly with our platform.

turnkey.title: TURNKEY
turnkey.desc: Digicetra's Turnkey solution, designed for licensed operators, includes everything: Sportsbook, Casino, Virtual Sports, Live Casino, Lottery betting, and TV Games. Scale confidently with our comprehensive suite.

tech.subtitle: Ready to lead the game and outpace the competition?

platform.title: DIGICETRA PLATFORM
platform.desc1: Digicetra is a dynamic iGaming platform delivering cutting-edge B2B software solutions designed to surpass traditional platforms in speed, scalability, and reliability.
platform.desc2: Built on a flexible, modular foundation, Digicetra adapts swiftly to meet unique market and operational needs, empowering you to manage your business efficiently from a single, centralized location. Enjoy streamlined operations, automated processes, and tools that make oversight effortless.

sportsbook.title: Sportsbook
sportsbook.desc: Launch your sportsbook with ease—a perfect fit for iGaming aggregators, platforms, and operators.

casino.title: Casino
casino.desc: Access over 10,000 games, including live games, virtual sports, lotteries, jackpots, free spins, and tournaments—all in one hub.

bonusEngine.title: Bonus Engine
bonusEngine.desc: Effortlessly create and manage diverse bonuses and free bets with 150+ customizable activity parameters.

paymentSystem.title: Payment System
paymentSystem.desc: Choose from 250+ global payment methods, including crypto, with seamless fund management and integration.

riskManagement.title: Risk Management & Anti-fraud
riskManagement.desc: Minimize risks with rapid identification and tracking, plus flexible customer categorization for enhanced security.

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.desc: Build insights with customizable reports across 100+ metrics, enhanced by high-performance dashboards.

retail.title: Retail
retail.desc: Centralize large retail network management with tailored layouts, multilingual support, and advanced BI tools.

crm.title: CRM
crm.desc: Automate marketing with real-time data, 200+ triggers, and multichannel communication for optimal engagement.

cms.title: CMS
cms.desc: Boost casino operations and player experience with robust, performance-enhancing tools.
